gemini_config.system_instruction: A botanical diagram of a , illustrated in the style of vintage scientific journals. Accented with natural tones and detailed cross-sections, itâ€™s labeled with handwritten annotations in sepia ink, evoking a scholarly, antique charm.

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""A botanical diagram of a , illustrated in the style of vintage scientific journals. Accented with na..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
